name: UntitledCharts
subtitle: A source for the PJSK community.
description: Welcome to the UntitledCharts source! The latest download for Retro Sekai.

apps.name: Retro Sekai!
apps.subtitle: Project Sekai but OLD.
apps.localizedDescription: RetroSekai, like most apps by UntitledCharts, is whitelisted! Join our Discord @ https://discord.gg/UntitledCharts. In order to play on this app, you MUST meet the requirements as stated on our Discord server (such as being somewhat active). Any apps listed in this repo will not have outrageous whitelist requirements./n/nWelcome to RetroSekai!/n/nRetroSekai is a private server for the popular game Project Sekai (プロセカ, officially HATSUNE MIKU: COLORFUL STAGE) that brings back the game's 2.8.0 version. This version is the last version that has the game's

, a nostalgic and cool UI that was modernized after version 3.0.0 (also known as the 3rd anniversary update)./n/nFor more information, join our Discord! You can ask questions or discuss RetroSekai with others.
